name: Magic Tower 3D
description: Experience classic dungeon RPG in 3D. Challenge yourself by walking through 22 carefully designed levels and battling with over 40+ cool looking blocky style enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512mb + Storage: 100 MB available space
